alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Central Ventura County Valleys; Cuyama Valley; Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Ynez Valley; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued November 03 at 11:00AM PDT until November 04 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees possible. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, Antelope Valley, Southern Salinas Valley, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, Santa Ynez Valley, Ojai Valley and Central Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Central Ventura County Valleys; Cuyama Valley; Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Ynez Valley; Southern Salinas Valley
